For the briefest of moments Zarak caught a glimpse of the reading on
his scanner, and all he  could see immediately that what was hidden in
Tuscon's helm was no simple rat, there was too much energy there.

However the rat quickly transferred energy to Tuscon in the form of a
fuel dump, and quicker than Zarak would have thought possible Tuscon
was back in action, along with Rat Trap!

It seemed like it only took seconds! Rat Trap appeared, Tuscon
revived, Darkhawk was knocked down, and for a moment it seemed as if
Tuscon was going to drive right over him, but then he swerved, and
after a blast from Rat Trap that blasted open a section of wall they
took off down.

Zarak smiled as he sent a few shots from his energy rifle down after
the fleeing Autobot and Maximal!

Quickly he leaped over to where the fallen Darkhawk lay as he opened a
communication to Hydras and Perceptor, "The prisoner has escaped!"
Zarak looked back over at the hole that was blown in the door as he
spoke, "There were two of them. One of them was hiding on that Tuscon
Autobot. He somehow freed him and they're driving through the base!"

Even as Zarak did quick scan of Darkhawk to check his vitals, a deep
thunk of metal boots hitting thick deck plating could be heard from
behind him. A door slid open.

After ascertaining that Darkhawk would live he stood and turned, "Yes
my old friend, the time has come once again."

Taking up the entire frame of the door was the massive figure of
Scorponok, Zarak's second body so to speak. At the moment it was
headless, giving it a strangely ghastly and yet vulnerable appearance.
However that was easily rectified as Zarak leaped into the air and
with the tel-tale sounds of gears grinding he shifted into a head, one
that slipped perfectly between Scorponok's shoulders and clicked.

In his own form Zarak was short, even diminutive, but now joined once
again with Scorponok he was fully head and shoulders taller then most
Maximals and Predicons! With a Decepticon purple frame and powerfully
built green limbs he radiated aggression and domminance! The cannons
mounted on his shoulders and the massive claws that he had for hands
were mute testimony to the true destructive potential that lay at his
command.

He transformed into his destructive crab mode and took off after Rat
Trap and Tuscon!

OOC: I think that Cyclonus and Scourge and the rest are somewhat
separate from all this for them not to be involved, so I will post for
them in a different letter.

Preston
(Zarak-Scorponok)
